content:
Post484 said
What is my problem???

Probably your antivirus if you have 300+ copies of that single file. You can delete all of the copies of the file with a number and you probably need an exception in your antivirus program for the Thunderbird profile folder to stop it scanning in that folder while Thunderbird is running.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Your preference is not relevant here. It is not something you have control over.

If you want to offer feedback about the customization, or lack of, I suggest you use the feedback link on thunderbird's help menu. Seriously it is so many years since I had V60 installed I am not sure I even remember little details about it like that. I actually think it always showed a similar screen when you selected the account entry in the folder pane. However as I said, I am struggling to remember what it even looked like.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: If the old profile is still there, you might look in the folders at c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming\thunderbird\profiles The addressbook is abook.sqlite
creator: davidsk

content:
YOU are not using a service that is synchronized to the server storage. So even the read/unread status of email is synchronized. I suggest you get used to getting mail when it arrives, not when you click a button.

I still use POP because for some accounts it meets my needs better than IMAP. avoid exchange and the OWL add-on if at all possible as emulating the exchange web services is not something I want to be doing much of..
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Well I click on the headers at the top of the message list to sort by the heading named. A second click reverses the sort order.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
pdf.js (https://mozilla.github.io/pdf.js/) Ã¨ la libreria di Thunderbird che visualizza i PDF. Questa libreria converte il formato PDF in un suo equivalente HTML che poi Ã¨ visualizzato da Thunderbird. Con file PDF semplici la conversione Ã¨ praticamente perfetta. Con file PDF con caratteristiche tecniche o grafiche avanzante invece possono esserci delle imperfezioni come quella che hai descritto.

Non esiste una soluzione se non quella di attendere gli aggiornamenti di pdf.js. Oppure puoi impostare un diverso programma per aprire i PDF, perdendo perÃ² la comoditÃ  del visualizzatore integrato.
creator: @next

content: Tasks as you appear to be seeking to use them only work with Google calendar and tasks. Then only if you use the provider for Google calendar add-on from the add-on site to setup the account. So you need to install it first before adding the account/calendar

content:
I just had the same issue!

I downgraded Thunderbird using the following commands. The mask command is needed so it wont be auto-updated by Discover or Gnome Software

sudo flatpak update --commit=2151b1e101f1266d135040c142f4c36a7e3373dc772e75a509a38efc39ded993 org.mozilla.Thunderbird flatpak mask org.mozilla.Thunderbird
creator: me449

content: Ditto
creator: mozilla516

content:
Start TB with the following command

"C:\Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird\thunderbird.exe" -p --allow-downgrade

content: Betreft het hier een IMAP-account? Zo ja, als u de mail benadert via webmail, staan de berichten daar dan ook al in de map Ongewenst? Dan moet er aan de serverkant iets worden aangepast. Zo nee, dan is er wellicht in Thunderbird een filter actief. Om te testen kunt u er ook voor kiezen om ongewenste-berichtenfiltering uit te schakelen in de instellingen. Het is ook mogelijk dat de trainingsdata van Thunderbird corrupt is geraakt. Om dat op te lossen kunt u (met TB afgesloten) het bestand â€˜training.datâ€™ in het Thunderbird-profiel verwijderen (of ter back-up verplaatsen)
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content:
If it makes you feel any better, I've had the same issue (Alma Linux, but also Flatpak) - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1453148

I found on a blog post that an update went out when 128 was released which shouldn't have, so it's likely you and I installed it at that point, and then it was downgraded once flatpak was updated.

If you find the answer, let me know and feel free to add your "me too!" to my post to get it attention.
